content: Overall, for the third quarter consolidated revenues of $138.7 million, grew 12.5% versus third quarter of 2021 led by continued growth in the Contact Centers and Branded Product segments. Consolidated third quarter adjusted EBITDA of $9.7 million, decreased from $12.6 million versus the third quarter of last year, primarily driven by revenue decline in our Healthcare Apparel segment, due to continued softness in the healthcare market. During the third quarter, Healthcare Apparel revenues of $30 million, or down 15% to last year, reflecting continued softness in the healthcare market. Turning next to our Branded Product segment, revenues of $87 million, or up 21%, compared to the third quarter of 2021, which was primarily driven by sales attributable to the Sutterâs Mill and Guardian acquisitions in December 2021, and May 2022, respectively. Now, turning to our Contact Center segment during the third quarter, our Contact Center segment generated third quarter revenues of $23 million, or a year-over-year growth rate of 30%. Turning to the financial highlights of the third quarter, SGC reported consolidated revenues of $138.7 million versus $123.3 million during the third quarter of 2021, an increase of 12.5%.
